bioghist.p: Dr. Alfred Reginald Allen (1876-1918) was a Philadelphia neurologist and Major in the 314th United States Infantry. Major Allen was killed in action at the Battle of the Argonne, France September 30, 1918. Allen's son, Alfred Reginald Allen, Jr. was at one time Manager of the Philadelphia Orchestra.

scopecontent.p: Collection includes: Genealogical papers assembled by Dr. Alfred Reginald Allen, letters from Allen to his wife and son written during the First World War, war-time correspondence from Allen's compatriots in the Army, play manuscripts, postcards, photos, music manuscripts, sheet music and ephemera.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
